synopsis: Pilot of Vivy -Fluorite Eye’s Song- that was produced before the main story was made. After the TV anime had fully aired, it was first unveiled on August 21, 2021 in WIT STUDIO's 10th Anniversary Online Talk Show #3 with featured guest and Vivy character designer loundraw. The pilot was later separately published on WIT Studio's official YouTube channel on August 24, 2021.

title.jp: Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song - Pilot Movie
